activity.instructions: You receive this email from an old friend. Write her a reply.
activity.email: Hi, #Well, you asked how things are, and actually they aren't very good. Paul and I split up eight months ago, and since then I just haven't been able to pull myself together. I feel like I've lost my direction, and I don't know what I want anymore. Even at work things are getting difficult. Most days I can't face going into the office. When I am there, I don't seem to be able to focus on anything. I think perhaps I should just give up, and start afresh doing something different. Sorry to sound so down. Hope things are better for you. # Eve

activity.instructions: Your friend phones to talk about the recent airport delays. You weren't involved, but talk to her about what it must have been like.

item.audiotext: Did you hear about the terrible airport delays?
